title: Who was the first centillionaire? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I may be cynical, I’d say it had to be somebody in Germany after World War I, because if I read correctly, the German money got devalued so far that one need a wheelbarrow full of bank notes to buy a loaf of bread. Wikipedia says a centillion is “US : a number equal to 1 followed by 303 zeros — see Table of Numbers also, British : a number equal to 1 followed by 600 zeros, so maybe even in post-World War I Germany there weren’t any centillionaires?
